Name: Preparation Credits
Desc: A written order for materials with an inventory schedule attached. Used for Wishes. Automatically restored to 100 at 04:00.
Bg: The supplies prepared for the Moonlit Fair must be meticulously planned and allocated to ensure they fulfill as many wishes as possible.
Source: Wishing Stall (Complete Wish Upon the Moon IV to unlock)
Automatically restores to the full at 04:00 a.m.
